frameDefinitions: An Exporter moves Goods across a border from an Exporting_area to an Importing_area.
An Agent or a Cause disperses or scatters Individuals from the Source,a relatively confined space, to a the Goal_area, a broader space.
A Sent_item is prepared for, received after, or involved in a process of Sending, which may involve a particular kind of Transport_means.
A Sender plans the Path (along with Source and Goal) of a Theme and places it in circumstances such that it travels along this Path under the power of some entity other than the Sender.
Words in this frame describe acts in violation of a legal code.
A Deliverer hands off a Theme to a Recipient or (more indirectly) a Goal location, which is accessible to the Recipient.
frameExamples: Several companies actually make most of their income by <t>exporting</t> goods out of the country.
She <t>scattered</t> his ashes in the bay.
The <t>shipment</t> from Romania is destined for the Iraqi Police Forces.
I <t>sent</t> the manuscript to England to Bill.
He was accused of <t><fex name='Offense'>hijacking</fex></t> a tour bus full of people.
The staff of Ebags <t>delivered</t> the umbrella well ahead of schedule.
listRoleDefinitions:
The conscious entity, generally a person, that moves the <fen>Goods</fen> across a border out of the <fen>Exporting_area</fen>.  

Very often, an <fen>Exporting_area</fen> will metonymically stand in for the person or persons directly responsible for the movement of the <fen>Goods</fen>.  In such cases the constituent should be labeled <fen>Exporter</fen> on the first layer and with the appropriate locational role on the second layer.
The items of value whose location is changing.
The role <fen>Importing_area</fen> is the place that the <fen>Goods</fen> end up as a result of motion.
The place where the <fen>Goods</fen> are initially, before the the <fen>Exporter</fen> moves them.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Exporter</fen> moves the <fen>Goods</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> disperses or scatters the <fen>Individuals</fen>.
The <fen>Individuals</fen> are scattered by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
An event or force that causes that <fen>Individuals</fen> to disperse.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Individuals</fen> are dispersed.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the dispersing event happens.
The objects being sent.
When an interaction with the <fen>Sent_item</fen> occurs.
The  place in which the Sent_item is located.
This is the person who initiates the movement of the <fen>Theme</fen> and, unlike Carrying, does not accompany it.

The end of the path and intended goal of the sending.
I <t>sent</t> the logs <fex name='Goal'>to the shed</fex>.

The objects being sent.
I mailed <fex name='Theme'>the books</fex> <fex name='Goal'>to Alaska</fex>.
Note that <fen>Theme</fen> may be multiply instantiated.
They <t>mailed</t><fex name='Theme'>a questionnaire</fex> <fex name='Theme'>with a return envelope</fex>.

The mode of sending employed.
I <t>shipped</t> <fex name='Theme'>the crops</fex> <fex name='Transport_means'>by bigrig </fex>.

This is the recipient of the sent <fen>Theme</fen>.
<fex name='Sender'>Tess</fex> <t>mailed</t> <fex name='Theme'>a letter</fex> <fex name='Recipient'> to Abby</fex>
When the sending takes place
A spatial setting encomnpassing the Source location, where the Sending event takes place.
The illegal act.
This role denotes the person or entity that is badly affected by the <fen>Offense</fen>.
The individual who commits the Offense
This is the person who completes the movement of the <fen>Theme</fen> after having transported it.
The end of the path and intended goal of the sending.
The objects being delivered.
This is the <fen>Recipient</fen> of the sent <fen>Theme</fen>.
When the delivery takes place
The location at which the delivery takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The U.S.</fex> exports most of its peanut products.
Today the <fex><t>post</t></fex> contained a pair of brand new tyres from Continental.
Finally, <fex>today's</fex> mail contained yet another book by the same author.
After that, I notice the mail <fex>on the table</fex>.
I sent the letter to you <fex>last week</fex>.
Barney posted the letter on Monday <fex>in Athens</fex>
The police is investigating the homicide <fex>of Dr. Johnson</fex>.
That afternoon, <fex>a staff courier</fex> delivered the box from St. Petersburg to Largo.
I delivered the packages <fex>to the storage room</fex>.
I delivered <fex>the documents</fex> to the court house.
Tess delivered a package <fex>to Abby and her kitty</fex>.
I delivered the letter to you <fex>last week</fex>, Sir.
Barney delivered the letter on Monday <fex>in Sheboygan</fex>

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the InternationalMilitary Tribunal for the Far East
the U.S. National Archives andRecords Administration
